channel.title: Blitz3D
channel.description:
Blitz3D is another type of programming code, When I found it, Blitz3D is able to develop 2D and 3D games with ease.
To program with it, in my opinion is pretty easy to learn, and I learned some basics of it. It took me about a week or so.
[b]Blitz3D's homepage[/b] http://www.blitzbasic.com/Home/_index_.php
[b]The gallery of the games made with Blitz3D[/b] http://www.blitzbasic.com/gallery/gallery.php
[b]Here is a video, that shows the games made with Blitz3D[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w149E_VnO_o
[b]If you are interested in Blitz3D, here is a video link to obtain a free version of it.[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q7_7G1yf9B0
[b]Here is a playlist with videos teaching you the basics, though the program itself provides a tutorial itself[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dO2RI0b2N0c&list=PLRJvImgPvSp9uYnlkKI-hdxvfmOX2spg2&index=1
